title: Ghanshyam on Twitter
body: Ghanshyam @ghanshyam_in #reduce #reuse #recycle When u talk u are only repeating what you already know...But when u listen u may learn something new!!! -Dalai Lama
readable_content:
Ghanshyam (@ghanshyam_in) (2018-01-07): @Cmofkarnataka sir ur #kammkibaat is awesome... Roads of #nammabengaluru are as smooth as #mysoresilk. I enjoy everyday for the last 4+years... Look forward for the day when u transform all the roads of #suvarnakarnataka to the above state.. @BBMPCOMM1 @BBMP_MAYOR

- Ghanshyam (@ghanshyam_in) (2018-01-07): #reduce #reuse #recycle When u talk u are only repeating what you already know...But when u listen u may learn something new!!! -Dalai Lama
